title: Jacob Knyspel
text:
Hi! üëã I‚Äôm a PhD student at King‚Äôs College London, funded by a studentship from the KCL MRC DTP. My area of research is the genetics of PTSD. I‚Äôm especially interested in improving phenotypic specificity in genetics research by focusing on specific traumatic experiences and specific PTSD symptoms. In my research I use a combination of genomic and family-based methods.
Alongside my studies I work as a graduate teaching assistant at King‚Äôs College London and as a tutor for The Brilliant Club.

title: Jacob Knyspel
text: I‚Äôm a PhD student at King‚Äôs College London, funded by a studentship from the KCL MRC DTP. My area of research is the genetics of common mental health conditions. I‚Äôm especially interested in improving causal inference and phenotypic specificity in psychiatric genetics research through the implementation of multivariate statistical methods such as graphical modelling and structural equation modelling.
